com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime

Interface IRuntime

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Execution

    public interface IRuntime
    Interface used by the generated code to interact with the orbit actors runtime.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Clock clock()
      Gets the local clock.
      Task registerReminder(IRemindable actor, String reminderName, long dueTime, long period, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Registers or updated a persisted reminder.
      Registration registerTimer(OrbitActor actor, Callable<Task<?>> taskCallable, long dueTime, long period, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Registers a timer to for the orbit actor
      Task<?> sendMessage(IAddressable toReference, boolean oneWay, int methodId, Object[] params)
      Sends a message to an actor or observer.
      Task unregisterReminder(IRemindable actor, String reminderName)
      Removes a previously registered reminder.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        Task<?> sendMessage(IAddressable toReference,
                    boolean oneWay,
                    int methodId,
                    Object[] params)
        Sends a message to an actor or observer.
        Parameters:
        toReference - destination actor reference or observer reference
        oneWay - should expect an answer, if false the task is completed with null.
        methodId - the generated id for the method
        params - the method parameters, must all be serializable.
        Returns:
        a future with the return value, or a future with null (if one-way)

      • registerTimer

        Registration registerTimer(OrbitActor actor,
                           Callable<Task<?>> taskCallable,
                           long dueTime,
                           long period,
                           TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Registers a timer to for the orbit actor
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor requesting the timer.
        taskCallable - a callable that must return a task.
        dueTime - the first time the timer will tick.
        period - the period of subsequent ticks (if ZERO then will only tick once)
        timeUnit - the time unit for period and dueTime
        Returns:
        a registration that allows to cancel the timer.

      • clock

        Clock clock()
        Gets the local clock. It's usually the system clock, but it can be changed for testing.
        Returns:
        the clock that should be used for checking the time during tests.

      • registerReminder

        Task registerReminder(IRemindable actor,
                      String reminderName,
                      long dueTime,
                      long period,
                      TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Registers or updated a persisted reminder.
        Parameters:
        actor - the reference to the actor.
        reminderName - the remainder's name
        dueTime - how long since now the first tick should be triggered.
        period - after the first tick, how often should the reminder be called.
        timeUnit - the time unit for dueTime and period
        Returns:
        completion promise for this operation

      • unregisterReminder

        Task unregisterReminder(IRemindable actor,
                        String reminderName)
        Removes a previously registered reminder.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor that registered this reminder
        reminderName - the remainder's name
        Returns:
        completion promise for this operation
